Generation III.Ruby: Salamence came about as a result of a strong, long-held dream of growing wings. It is said that this powerful desire triggered a sudden mutation in this Pok é mon 's cells, causing it to sprout its magnificent wings.
Generation III.Sapphire: By evolving into Salamence , this Pok é mon finally realizes its long-held dream of growing wings. To express its joy, it flies and wheels all over the sky while spouting flames from its mouth.
Generation III.Emerald: After many long years, its cellular structure underwent a sudden mutation to grow wings. When angered, it loses all thought and rampages out of control.
Generation III.FireRed: It becomes uncontrollable if it is enraged. It destroys everything with shredding claws and fire.
Generation III.LeafGreen: It becomes uncontrollable if it is enraged. It destroys everything with shredding claws and fire.

Generation IV.Diamond: As a result of its long-held dream of flying, its cellular structure changed, and wings grew out.
Generation IV.Pearl: As a result of its long-held dream of flying, its cellular structure changed, and wings grew out.
Generation IV.Platinum: As a result of its long-held dream of flying, its cellular structure changed, and wings grew out.
Generation IV.HeartGold: It's uncontrollable if enraged. It flies around spouting flames and scorching fields and mountains.
Generation IV.SoulSilver: It's uncontrollable if enraged. It flies around spouting flames and scorching fields and mountains.

Generation V.Black: As a result of its long-held dream of flying, its cellular structure changed, and wings grew out.
Generation V.White: As a result of its long-held dream of flying, its cellular structure changed, and wings grew out.
Generation V.Black 2: As a result of its long-held dream of flying, its cellular structure changed, and wings grew out.
Generation V.White 2: As a result of its long-held dream of flying, its cellular structure changed, and wings grew out.

Generation VI.X: It becomes uncontrollable if it is enraged. It destroys everything with shredding claws and fire.
Generation VI.Y: It's uncontrollable if enraged. It flies around spouting flames and scorching fields and mountains.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Salamence came about as a result of a strong, long-held dream of growing wings. It is said that this powerful desire triggered a sudden mutation in this Pokémon's cells, causing it to sprout its magnificent wings.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: By evolving into Salamence, this Pokémon finally realizes its long-held dream of growing wings. To express its joy, it flies and wheels all over the sky while spouting flames from its mouth.

Generation VII.Sun: Anyone standing in its path gets sliced right in two, while this Pokémon continues its flight without interruption.
Generation VII.Moon: Mega Evolution fuels its brutality, and it may even turn on the Trainer who raised it. It's been dubbed "the blood-soaked crescent."
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: The stress of its two proud wings becoming misshapen and stuck together because of strong energy makes it go on a rampage.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: It puts its forelegs inside its shell to streamline itself for flight. Salamence flies at high speeds over all kinds of topographical features.

Generation VIII.Sword: Salamence is an unusual Pokémon in that it was able to evolve a body with wings just by constantly wishing to be able to fly.
Generation VIII.Shield: While basking in the joy of flight generally keeps this Pokémon in high spirits, Salamence turns into an uncontrollable menace if something angers it.
Generation VIII.Brilliant Diamond: As a result of its long-held dream of flying, its cellular structure changed, and wings grew out.
Generation VIII.Shining Pearl: As a result of its long-held dream of flying, its cellular structure changed, and wings grew out.

Generation IX.Scarlet: It flies around on its wings, which have grown in at last. In its happiness, it gushes hot flames, burning up everything it passes over.
Generation IX.Violet: It becomes uncontrollable if it is enraged. It destroys everything with shredding claws and fire.

Generation VIII.Sword Expansion Pass: Tunnel to the Top , Path to the Peak ( Wanderer ) Giant's Bed , Path to the Peak , Ballimere Lake , Three-Point Pass , Frigid Sea ( Max Raid Battle )
